release_notes.en-US: This version is able to hide some items on the bookmarks menu/panel that could not be hidden before. It also fixes a bug with the developer tools menu caused by a change to Firefox. https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_17...VERSION_18

release_notes.en-US: Menu Filter now has a way to quickly find the items you're looking for. Just type in some of the text of the item. Thanks to anewuser for the suggestion. https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_16...VERSION_17

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Since the last version I've done a lot of work to improve Menu Filter for the menus attached to toolbar/panel buttons - history, bookmarks, and developer tools. The help menu on the panel (a.k.a. hamburger menu) is now filtered to match the help menu on the menu bar, as requested by a user. Please support me by making a donation today! https://darktrojan.github.io/donate.html?menufilter https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_15...VERSION_16

release_notes.en-US: Menu Filter now checks for items to hide when a menu is opened, instead of at startup, so items added later are hidden as expected. https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_14...VERSION_15

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This update fixes a totally-broken config page for users of Firefox Nightly and Thunderbird Nightly. https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_13...VERSION_14

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This version attempts to improve what happens when items are removed: * After items are hidden, if no items remain between two separators, one is removed. Similarly, if a separator is the first or last visible item, it is removed. * In Thunderbird, if an item is hidden from one of the main menus, Menu Filter attempts to hide the corresponding item on the hamburger menu also. You can also now hide the 'Open All in Tabs' item from bookmarks menus, and a bug has been fixed where some items weren't shown on the configuration page. https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_12...VERSION_13

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This version fixes about:menufilter, which was broken on Nightly and Developer channels. Also, by request, hiding items on the Bookmarks context menu also hides the same items on the context menu in the Bookmarks window. https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_11...VERSION_12

release_notes.en-US: This version fixes a bug for users of Tab Mix Plus. https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_10...VERSION_11 Or to see the bits that actually changed after a code-style cleanup: https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/aab9fbc...VERSION_11

release_notes.en-US: This update can now properly filter menubar menus on OS X. It also fixes a number of minor UI bugs. There are new Chinese translations (both variants). https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_9...VERSION_10

release_notes.en-US: This version includes a fix to allow you to hide more things in the toolbar bookmarks menu. https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_8...VERSION_9

release_notes.en-US: Version 8 adds a German translation. Items in the list now have an icon indicating visibility. You can click on the icon to show or hide an item. https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_7...VERSION_8

release_notes.en-US: This version adds some new menus to filter: * The developer tools menu * The bookmarks menu on the toolbar and in the panel * The history menu on the toolbar and in the panel There's also a tweak to improve startup time on Firefox. https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_6...VERSION_7

release_notes.en-US: This version hides menu items when mail messages are open in a new window, filters a new menu in Thunderbird/SeaMonkey and has some UI tweaks. https://github.com/darktrojan/menufilter/compare/VERSION_5...VERSION_6

release_notes.en-US:
Bookmarks and History menus added in Firefox.
Lightning's "Events and Tasks" menu added in Thunderbird.

Now supports SeaMonkey! Browser window only at this stage.
